item.title: System Design for Blog Website
item.description: Problem statement Context Imagine you have to design a system for serving blogs to massive readers (10k tps). How would you design the system? Requirements Propose your design Write your very first blog about it Solutions Version 1.0 In this version, I mainly focus on how to release a system that is simple and can work well in a small scope. Explain Web server : work as a reverse proxy After Client sends a request to Web server , it forwards this request to API.
